query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `evidence_items` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `caseId` INT NOT NULL,
  `evidenceType` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  `category` VARCHAR(100),
  `title` VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  `description` TEXT,
  `fileUrl` TEXT,
  `fileName` VARCHAR(500),
  `fileType` VARCHAR(100),
  `fileSize` INT,
  `thumbnailUrl` TEXT,
  `ocrText` LONGTEXT,
  `ocrConfidence` DECIMAL(5,2),
  `aiSummary` TEXT,
  `aiTags` JSON,
  `capturedAt` TIMESTAMP NULL,
  `uploadedBy` INT NOT NULL,
  `uploadedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `verifiedBy` INT,
  `verifiedAt` TIMESTAMP NULL,
  `isVerified` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  `chainOfCustody` JSON,
  `legalHold` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  INDEX `case_idx` (`caseId`),
  INDEX `type_idx` (`evidenceType`),
  INDEX `category_idx` (`category`),
  INDEX `uploaded_idx` (`uploadedAt`)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user tzGyVcj9oHnaUv9.3cfa47fa1e17 --database bQwuvX7ycRD88MLXJHLZXd --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `evidence_items` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `caseId` INT NOT NULL,
  `evidenceType` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  `category` VARCHAR(100),
  `title` VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  `description` TEXT,
  `fileUrl` TEXT,
  `fileName` VARCHAR(500),
  `fileType` VARCHAR(100),
  `fileSize` INT,
  `thumbnailUrl` TEXT,
  `ocrText` LONGTEXT,
  `ocrConfidence` DECIMAL(5,2),
  `aiSummary` TEXT,
  `aiTags` JSON,
  `capturedAt` TIMESTAMP NULL,
  `uploadedBy` INT NOT NULL,
  `uploadedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `verifiedBy` INT,
  `verifiedAt` TIMESTAMP NULL,
  `isVerified` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  `chainOfCustody` JSON,
  `legalHold` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  INDEX `case_idx` (`caseId`),
  INDEX `type_idx` (`evidenceType`),
  INDEX `category_idx` (`category`),
  INDEX `uploaded_idx` (`uploadedAt`)
)
